title: test: const.go failing
body:
With current gate head, test/const.go is failing for me (on Solaris amd64):

```
# go run run.go -- const.go
exit status 2
# command-line-arguments
./const.go:144: illegal constant expression: *int == interface {}
./const.go:146: illegal constant expression: interface {} == *int

FAIL    const.go        0.660s
```
